item.description:
Hey fellow Social Fun members, 

I'm organizing a an Intimate Mixer and we currently have a couple spots left. 
I want to invite you.

 

Do big Mix and Mingles intimidate you? Are you new to Meetup? Do you like meeting interesting new people?

 

The purpose of this event is to make it very easy for you to meet fellow new members in a popular, safe, and intimate setting.

 

Do you dislike when parties are too big and you can't even hear?

This will be an intimate party. Fifty people. New members.

Discover what Meetups about. Meet interesting new people.

Sip some refreshing spirits at the bar. Discover a popular Boston bar.

 

This event is $5. Please pay with a $5 bill when you walk in.

Keep it easy and the line flowing.

 

Light appetizers will be provided for you.

 

Intimate. 50 people. The rooms small. It will fill up fast!

 

Don't miss this adventure, ! :)

Josh

 

P.S. We already have more than forty people coming and there are only a couple spots left.

Learn more or discover who else is coming: Intimate Mixer
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have the private room exclusively for us. I'll provide my cell # for your convenience.
item.name: Who else is coming - Intimate Member Mixer...
